content: As an AI language model, I cannot determine the preferences of your kids. However, based on the list, I think your kids could enjoy visiting Pench National Park for a wildlife safari as it's always fascinating for children to see wild animals in their natural habitat. They might also enjoy visiting Maharajbagh Zoo and Balaji Mandir for a closer look at different animals and holy experiences. But again, it's ultimately up to you and your family to decide which activity would be the most enjoyable for everyone involved.
